sub_title: Expert in Sales, Operations and Online Program Management (OPM) in Higher Education.  Building Mixmasters with world class electronic music producers and coaches.  Diving into the world of vibrational therapy.
summary:
Starting off as a music industry entrepreneur after setting up a record company straight out of university I have since worked in sales within IT, Advertising and Education.  I have built a successful career and have a proven track record in sales performance, team building and coaching.  Naturally positive and self-motivated, through ethical leadership and collaboration I help drive businesses forward.  

After leaving Laureate at the end of 2016 I took a sabbatical, spending time with my family in Asia working on a project to promote Sound Healing around the world.  This experience enabled me to develop my ability to work in diverse cultural environments and improved my project management skills.  I am continuing to support Sound Healing projects in Bali and the UK through mentoring and coaching through my record label Hi-Phi Music (www.hi-phimusic.com).  I joined CEG Digital in early 2018 and have helped grow the business from 200 new students per year to now well over 3000 new students per year.

I am now consulting with two companies leading the development and growth in both organisations.  These contracts draw on my passion and expertise in both music and education.  At Skilled Education I am responsible for building an OPM division to deliver a portfolio of post graduate online degrees and at Mixmasters I am responsible for running the operations of the business and being the right hand of the founder as we take on huge growth expectations.  Please email me at paul@fusionman.com or call me on +31 628928239 to discuss any potential opportunities for us to collaborate.

treasury_media.title: Reach a global market through flexible online learning
treasury_media.description: CEG Digital partners with prestigious, high-quality UK universities to deliver online and blended courses to a global market on a part-time, flexible basis.

school.name: University of the West of England

profile_positions.description: Heading up the marketing, recruitment, service and support for Skilled OPM partnerships and building a robust, creative team to disrupt in this very competitive space.
profile_positions.title: Chief Revenue Officer (CRO)

profile_positions.description: Mixmasters is a global leader for training electronic musicians.  Our ever-growing library of over 200 expert-led courses gives you the knowledge and tools to build a successful career as an electronic music artist.
profile_positions.title: Head of Operations

profile_positions.description:
Hi-Phi Music Biography
The notion that the human brain is programmed to be stimulated by beauty is an interesting one. Isn’t beauty subjective and in the eye of the beholder?  Then, why is it in art that some things just work?  They are universally applauded and cherished for their beauty.
Creative people have understood this for centuries and have drawn their inspiration from the beauty in nature where perfection means survival.  Think of butterfly’s wings, the leaves on a tree or the spirals on a shell, these things have evolved throughout time to be perfect for their required purpose and the laws of Phi, the natural ratio of beauty, govern them all.  The golden ratio or 1:1.618 used by architects, artists and musicians to create work which is not only pleasing to the senses but also entirely functional for its purpose.  
2006 was a wonderful year.  The summer seemed to last all year long and a label, inspired by beautiful music to seep into, was born.  Hi-Phi Music, a label that defies genre association but is rooted in natural beauty, aims to transfer this natural beauty into musical form, fit for any Hi-Fi.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Set up in 1998 by Ade Fenton and Paul Smith as an outlet for hard techno. More than 20 years on the label has evolved into a home for any music that is designed to make you dance. Over the years, and close to 50 releases, the label has been a spring board for many artists to present themselves to the world before moving on to other labels or creating their own labels. We have never been afraid to give new artists a chance if the music feels right.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
I AM Sound is a TV platform and learning portal exploring the world of sound, energy & vibration. I AM Sound is a conscious TV & membership platform based between London & Ibiza.
We're capturing and documenting the global rise of the wellbeing movement in a way that has never been done before. With the biggest names in the world of sound and spirituality we are bridging the gap between magic and science by using the fun and transformational power of music to unite us all.
Our unique subscription based TV and membership platform supports individuals on their true journey
of S.E.L.F development: SOUND, ENERGY, LIGHT & FREEDOM
profile_positions.title: Head of Operations

profile_positions.description: Leading the sales operation for Cambridge Education Group's Digital division requires supporting our partner Universities in their new student recruitment goals for their online portfolio of programs.  The University of Southampton, Queen Mary's University London, Cass Business School, London and Falmouth University are our main partners, offering a wide range of business, creative, technology and legal degrees and courses, mainly at Masters level.
profile_positions.title: Director of Student Recruitment - CEG Digital

profile_positions.description:
After 10 years at Laureate I took some time out with my family to explore the wonders of Bali and South East Asia. During this time of personal evolution, healing and connection I became very active in the local community and supported many projects.
 - Entrepreneurial involvement in the local Bali Sound Healers Collective
 - Project Manager on a crowdfunding campaign through Kickstarter to
 raise money for recording and touring
 - Organised and managed a 30 date European tour
 - Produced and manufactured an album for general release through all
 the major music retailers such as iTunes, Spotify and Amazon
 - Stage Manager on a 5-day conscious music festival 'Ancient Futures'
profile_positions.title: Sabbatical

profile_positions.description:
Laureate is a leading global Universities network of over 70 Univiersities. I was promoted to run the €55M sales operation for the University of Liverpool Online partnership responsible for enrolment performance improvement, reducing cost per enrolment, reducing overall sales & marketing costs and delivering budget portfolio performance.
 - Transformed a 3-year decline in sales up to 2015 delivering the most profitable year ever for the 
 University of Liverpool Online business
 - Led 4 sites globally in Baltimore, Gdansk, Amsterdam and Shanghai delivering better in market sales performance and customer service.  YOY growth of 14% in 2016
 - Cultivated a consistent sales methodology focusing on consultative and challenger sales techniques 
 improving individual contributor performance by 30%. Personal coaching of managers was key to
success.
 - Reduced Sales and Marketing costs by 25% in the first year which generated a more streamlined, 
 higher performing team.
 - Aligned Sales, Marketing and Product departments to deliver on collaborative goals ensuring portfolio budgets across verticals were achieved.
profile_positions.title: Director, Enrolment Management

profile_positions.description:
I progressed from a sales position through 3 managerial posts in the Amsterdam Enrolment department.  Key responsibilities and achievements are as follows:
•	Building the Walden International business from 10 advisors and 200 students per year into a team of 45 advisors delivering 2000 students per year
•	Establishing the Roehampton Enrolment team and devising the enrolment process and structure to deliver high growth in New students
•	Developed the team from 6 advisors up to 40 advisors delivering a budgeted new student count of 2500 students this year
•	Achieved a companywide performance award for delivering change management and process development for the enrolment function with the Roehampton business
profile_positions.title: Enrolment Manager

profile_positions.description: B2C Consultative Sales in the Education Sector.  I was specifically working with the portfolio of Online Post Graduate degrees offered through Laureate's partnership with The University of Liverpool.
profile_positions.title: Enrolment Advisor

profile_positions.description:
Autotrader.co.uk is the UK’s market-leading motoring website. As Senior Account Manager for the Midlands Office, I was responsible for managing and developing the account base throughout this region and was the senior representative for all customer service issues within this department. My key responsibilities - 
•	Managing a team of 7 account managers and 2 administrative staff.  When I joined the department we had 200 accounts, which had risen to 850 accounts when I left
•	My team was responsible for invoicing £100,000 worth of orders per week. This required strict process organisation and staff training
•	Conducting ongoing dialogue with other departments (production, accounts, customer support) in ensuring the setting and delivery of service level agreements (SLA’s)
•	Implementing customer service incentives and providing my team with customer expectation training in order to excel in customer satisfaction and repeat orders 
•	Identifying potential areas of development within team processes and setting individual goals and targets
•	Budget management and forecasting monthly/yearly production schedules, account base and revenue
profile_positions.title: Senior Account Manager Team Lead
